text:
<@U02NWMWF7GF> this article from documentation might help you to get acquainted with modules
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/files>

In short, you need to add fields in the right pane of the Design Manager.

I’d also recommend you explore the structure of default HubSpot modules in the folder @HubSpot
<https://share.getcloudapp.com/llukGzDk>

I'm super confused. HubSpot service desk tightly integrates with CES surveys and there are a number of custom fields created by HubSpot for the purpose of knowing the last feedback status and date related to CES.... but the service analytics only shows CSAT analytics (which is kind of pointless since CSAT is not triggered by tickets nor does it reflect effort for support teams).

Am I misunderstanding something fundamental, or did the team at HubSpot responsible for service analytics mess up and accidentally reference the wrong type of survey?
Curious on this one. I know what I generally do, but wondering what the most common practices are. Please vote above and comment if you’d like. Thanks!

Please give a try to our Zoho Sign Integration for HubSpot CRM and give us feedback. With ZohoSign Integration, Salespersons can create, send and track ZohoSign envelopes directly from HubSpot. Your team can track the status of these documents without having to leave HubSpot.

Interested in Early Access? Click the below link to install the extension.

<https://api-osync.oapps.xyz/app/zoho_sign/authorize/index.html|ZohoSign - HubSpot Extension Install Link>

For any queries reach us - <mailto:help@oapps.xyz|help@oapps.xyz> (edited)
